today.text: Take 5 minutes this evening to reflect on your day. What went well? What was challenging?

thisWeek.text: This week, consider exploring Problem Solving when you feel ready. No pressure - healing happens at your own pace.
Continue taking care of yourself with whatever self-care feels right for you.
When you're ready, consider starting with one small DBT skill practice. Every journey begins with a single step.
Focus on daily moments of mindfulness and self-compassion. You deserve the same kindness you'd show a good friend.

Remember, this plan is created just for you based on what you shared today. If anything feels unclear or overwhelming, chat with Grace anytime - she's here to help explain or adjust these suggestions to better fit your needs.
